sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
NOTE: This Action requires creation of a Cross Scope privilege to write on the sys_update_set table.
This Action queries all 'in progress' (ongoing) Update Sets belonging to a specific users and sets them to 'Ignore'. This can be typically useful when an admin / developer leaves a team, but some of their Update Sets still show up as 'In Progress'. This Action could be part of a larger 'Offboarding' Flow.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Ignore User's "In Progress" Update Sets
